short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Speak or just copy and paste to create a note. Choose a background or load your own, choose a font and then print.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Speak and create a note or just copy unformatted text and paste to send a note, can be for Thanksgiving, a festive one, any other occasion or for just the fun of speaking or writing. Choose a background image or load your own image , choose a font and then print. 

Note: Settings for standard A4 size paper. Also, make sure the printer has the required settings to display the background image.
